phrases: It is because we are Fairy Tail, see?!
I need to think a bit-kabo...
Here is the list of battle matches...
For the sake of our true purpose...
the current standings of the third day of the Grand Magic Games!
As before, Raven Tail is in first place!
The time has come at last...
Still in second place, Lamia Scale!
In third place, one rank down, Sabertooth!
moving up two ranks, the Fairy Tail A team!
We are going to move up even more ranks!
In sixth place, the Fairy Tail B team!
We are not going to lose either!
And you can see the last place teams for yourself.
I guess when you are in seventh place, you do not even get a name check...
If Quatro Puppy's going to be our name, I am glad he did not say it!
Alright, the battle part of the third day of the Grand Magic Games is about to begin!
I am looking forward to the battle part!
In the first match, it is Millianna of Mermaid Heel...
It is a body attack, using his giant body to spin around!
I will use magic to slow him down!
Keep it up and you will win!
That spurred my spinning on even more!
She is taken a lot of damage.
Millianna would never lose over a few bruises like this.
There is someone Millianna needs to defeat.
Until she brings him down, she will not lose.
If I cannot beat a guy like this, I better pack it in...
There would be no point in joining Mermaid Heel!
Is this going to decide the match?!
I will tear this junk right off!
I am not letting go, no matter what!
That are not wild at all!
Semas is down for the count!
Now that was an interesting battle!
And she used various kinds of magic.
Even though getting bound by that tube
would not draw a score on that magic-measuring device from before...
It was rough for me when I went up against her a long time ago, too.
Next, the second match for the battle part!
From Sabertooth, the minstrel who sings to the red moon...
Versus Holy Night Eve of Blue Pegasus...
These two clashed during the competition of the first day,
and now they will collide in battle on the third day!
That is your memory of where I was standing.
I already experienced your skill during Hidden.
Eve's got a memory like that?!
I do not remember that parfum!
A star falls on the night!
Or so we thought, but it was just a copy made of snow!
Eve-kun was originally a member of the Council, was not he?
He was a Rune Knight of the Enforcement and Detention Corps like the rest of us.
Yes, even back then, he was a shining light,
but after entering a guild, his magic has become even more polished.
I am using White Blizzard to search for the location of your real body!
What kind of Molding Magic is that?!
Magic that gives form to memories?
So there is more to this than meets the eye, huh?
It is getting kind of hot out here...
I am sensing the rise of a tremendous magic power...
Eve fought a good fight, but he fell short of Rufus!
The winner is Rufus of Sabertooth!
It is my job to beat him.
How could Eve lose like that?
Still, he really did do his best...
We have really fallen hard in the rankings...
Like a flower's parfum, be at ease, men.
We still have a secret weapon.
It is so important that I said it twice.
At any rate, I wonder who that rabbit really is...
If he will not even tell us...
Do not tell me it is not even a member of our guild?
That would be against the rules!
Moving right along, let us begin the third match-kabo!
From the Fairy Tail B team, Laxus Dreyar!
His opponent is from Ivan's guild...
I am sure you got nothing to worry about.
We are talking about Laxus here...
Juvia's got a bad feeling about this...
There is been bad blood between father and son guilds since day one, right, Yajima-san?
Lahar-kun, you brought along people from the Corps, right?
Keep a close eye on Raven Tail.
If there is any skulduggery, stop the match immediately.
What do you mean HQ, Warren?
Currently, there are no conspicuous movements from Raven Tail.
I am not going to let you do any funny business like that first day, Crow-chan!
Just try to tarnish Laxus's valor.
The Raijinshuu will not guarantee your lives.
Ever says she wants to go back by Elfman...
I will not let you pull any more cowardly stunts.
Doing everything in your power to protect your comrades...
And just a little bit of enjoying the circumstances...
The ultimate form of my aspirations
Do not forget this, Third Master.
And it is actually the seventh...
So you are in my old man's guild?
Who the hell are you, anyway...?
You got to be kiddin' me!
He is getting his ass kicked?
I do not believe it... Laxus?!
Who the hell is that masked freak?!
Laxus cannot even lift a finger!
is talking about this right now.
They cannot see our true bodies.
What they see are phantoms fighting.
It looks real, does not it?
Not one person realizes it is an illusion.
The crowd is watching images of the mighty Laxus as helpless as a baby.
Why is Laxus on the ropes like this?!
I do not think they are doing anything crooked over here either!
It is time to get serious!
It seems that even your guild idolizes you.
I wonder how your compatriots feel while watching this...
I have got no idea what this is about.
What is the point of winning an illusory battle?
The end result can be altered as we like.
That is how you do it!
I figured he would be okay.
It looks like we were worried for nothing.
In the end, they did not do anything, huh?
I was a fool for worrying about Laxus even for a moment!
Is this the end of Laxus's counterattack?!
What the hell is going on here?!
Is this the end result you were talkin' about?
Depending on your negotiations with us,
it is possible that we would even let you win this.
We have got nothing to talk about.
The illusions do not mean a damn thing.
I am going to finish this by taking out your real self right here and now.
Not even you can defeat Raven Tail's elite all at the same time.
And there is one more thing.
You know how strong I am, do not you...
Makarov would die before he coughed it up.
You do not have to play dumb.
I am sure Makarov has told you.
Well, even if I did, I would not tell you.
You are in a hopeless situation, but I am willing to let you win.
Although if you do not accept the condition...
Jeez, you are a real pain in the ass.
I can understand why Gramps washed his hands of you.
See, the master's enemies are my enemies!
Apparently, you need to be taught a lesson...
Those guys are not using another underhanded trick, are they?
Everyone is keepin' a close watch on them, so it is got to be okay.
Like he ate too much at last night's banquet and now his stomach is upset?
I bet there is something on his mind!
Like he is lonely'because he is got almost no friends...
